attributes.action: Ban the sale of Emergency Hormonal Contraception (Morning After Pill) over the counter.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people purchase or recieve the Morning After Pill from the pharmacy without understanding the full implications both medically and in terms of whether or not it is abortion (which depends on at what stage of embryonic or foetal development you believe life begins).  There is not always the opportunity or time for adequate councelling within the community pharmacy setting to discuss all these issues and many people take this drug without giving it a great deal of thought.
